review: Does not work with apple products as suggested on the package. I took a gamble on this over the chromecast because it had a remote ( I thought that would be a bonus over chromecast) However, I have since learned that it does not offer an app through your apple devices. It does work well... decent amount of apps (does not have crackle or disney movie digital copy). Occasionally freezes (not my internet because I have Netflix on my blue ray player and xbox 360 and they never freeze). I got it on sale for $25, so I can't complain... it makes a dumb tv smart for that little!
